attributes.description:
MAJOR SERVICE JUST DONE!!
This popular hatch comes with all the Comfortline features along with power and great fuel economy too.

- With It fueling on Diesel hence turbo powered, the feel of driving around and long distance is real.
-Comfortline , offers electric windows and mirrors, 
- Radio with many features (Bluetooth, Aux,Usb,Cd)
-12v charging port, Abs, Air conditioner

Book to view it, Get assisted through Finance /Trade ins Welcome !!

attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient. *T’s & C’s apply and price excludes standard license, registration and delivery charges.
